text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Vam ne dozvoleno buty spadkoyemtsyamy druzhyn proty yikhn聞oyi voli. Ne zaboronyayte yim zabraty chastynu toho, shcho vy yim daly, khiba yak vony vchynyat聞 yavnyy perelyub. Povod聞tesya z druzhynamy hidno. I navit聞 yakshcho vony nepryyemni vam, to, mozhlyvo, nepryyemne dlya vas te, kudy Allah vklav bahato dobra
